1: <pb/>Re' i Moisés xuq'oreej taqe i ju'jun chi k'amal kib'eeh i ju'jun ch'uq chi aj Israel, je' wili i xuq'or keh: Re' QaJaaw Dios je' wili xuq'or:
2: Wila' awach i xuq'or i xti korik reh i Dios chi wilik i naa rub'anam, chi wilik i naa ruye'em ma' naa ta rukahniik chi je' re' koruman chi naa rub'anam aha' wilik i xuq'or.
3: <pb/>Wila' re' jino'q i k'isa q'ahxoq ko patim nahq'ab' i tuut rajaaw xuq'or i xti korik reh i Dios chi wilik i naa rub'anam chi wilik i naa ruye'em.
4: Koruman chi naa ruye'em aha' wilik i xuq'or chi naa ruye'em, eh chi naa rub'anam aha' wilik i xuq'or wila' reht'al i rajaaw, wila' ma' xq'ilarik chub'aan.
5: Eh raaj wila' re' rajaaw xunab'eej chi wilik i naa rub'anam, chi wilik i naa ruye'em i rixq'uun, eh wila' xuq'il chub'aan, neenkuyarik ru mahk ruum i Dios chi ma' nee ta rub'an aha' wilik i xuq'or.
6: <pb/>Eh wila' re' q'ahxoq re' re' xub'an kaxáro noq ruq'orom chik i xti korik reh i Dios chi wilik i naa rub'anam, chi wilik i naa ruye'em,
7: wila' xunab'eej i rub'ahiil, eh ma' xuq'il ta chi riij. Re' q'ahxoq re' re' koruman chi naa rub'anam aha' wilik i xuq'or chi naa rub'anam, chi naa ruye'em.
8: Eh raaj wila' xq'ilarik ruum i rub'ahiil neerub'an chi ma' nee ta rub'an aha' wilik i xuq'or chi ma' nee ta ruyeew aha' wilik i xuq'or chi naa ruye'em, neenkuyarik ru mahk ruum i Dios.
9: <pb/>Eh raaj wila' ch'aq kaxáro ixoq, oon kamnaq i rub'ahiil xq'orik i xti korik chi wilik i naa rub'anam, koruman chi naa rub'anam.
10: <pb/>Eh wila' re' jino'q ixoq parupaat i rub'ahiil wilik noq xuq'or i xti korik reh i Dios chi wilik i naa rub'anam, chi wilik i naa ruye'em.
11: Eh noq neerunab'eej i rub'ahiil, wila' ma' xq'ilarik chub'aan. Re' ixoq re' re' koruman chi naa rub'anam aha' wilik i xuq'or chi naa rub'anam, eh chi naa ruye'em.
12: Eh raaj wila' q'ilarik ruum i rub'ahiil neerub'an chi ma' nee ta rub'an i xuq'or chi naa rub'anam, eh chi ma' nee ta ruyeew i xuq'or chi naa ruye'em, eh neenkuyarik ru mahk ruum i Dios.
13: <pb/>Je' re' noq re' ixoq re' rub'ahiil naa ruq'oriik mineerub'an, oon ma' nee ta rub'an aha' wilik xuq'or i xti korik chi naa rub'anam, oon chi naa ruye'em.
14: Eh noq neerunab'eej i rub'ahiil, eh wila' xik'ik kiib' ixib'-oq q'iij chi ma' xta xuq'or reh. Ar naa ruk'utiniik chi k'ahchi' ruye'em q'ab' chi naa rub'anam ixoq aha' wilik xuq'or i xti korik chi naa rub'anam, eh chi naa ruye'em.
15: Eh wila' wilik chik q'iij rib'iram noq xuq'il i rehk'een chi riij i naa rub'anam i naa ruye'em. Re' b'ahiilb'ees re' re' wach naah i reh naa ruk'ahniik i ru mahk i rehk'een, inki.
16: <pb/>Re' i taqe k'uhb'aal wili xuq'or i QaJaaw Dios reh i Moisés chi keh i b'ahiilb'ees chi keh i ehk'eenb'ees, chi keh ajaab'ees, chi keh kixq'uun ko wilik kuuk' pankipaat.
